caption.p: Complexity and heterogeneity of tomato yellow leaf curl disease-associated begomovirus populations evolved from single viral sequences in three crop species and a wild host.

fn.label: a
fn.p: ST, susceptible tomato; RT, resistant tomato; CB, common bean; SN, Solanum nigrum.

fn.label: c
fn.p: TYLCSV, tomato yellow leaf curl Sardinia virus; TYLCV, tomato yellow leaf curl virus; and TYLCMaV, tomato yellow leaf curl Malaga virus.

fn.label: d
fn.p: Numbers in brackets indicate replicate sample.

fn.label: e
fn.p: Total number of mutations found in the indicated number of clones analyzed in the quasispecies
